Piltene
Frederiksnagore
Our people are now binging on your alcohol and praising your architecture. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Organise a Witch-hunt

Blasted witches; infecting our empire with their devilry and sorcery and whatever other blasphemous nonsense they get up to. Under our laws, these abominable crimes are punishable by death. It is time to cleanse these wretches from our lands; it is time to organise a noble witch-hunt![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Denmark-Norway [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must not have adopted the Freedom Ideology [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{3_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points

Blasted witches; infecting our empire with their devilry and sorcery and whatever other blasphemous nonsense they get up to. Under our laws, these abominable crimes are punishable by death. It is time to cleanse these wretches from our lands; it is time to organise a noble witch-hunt![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A lump sum of [ICON_PEACE] Faith [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A lump sum of [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age progress
Abolish the Rigsraad

The Rigsraad, the Privy Council which represents the interests of the magnates and the nobility, has become weak and ineffectual. Plagued by corruption and stubborn conservatism, the council is impeding the progress of our empire, and it is time that it be abolished. Let all political authority retun to the sovereign, where it rightfully belongs.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Denmark-Norway [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cost of future [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies is reduced by 10% [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost is approximately the cost of your next Social Policy

The Rigsraad, the Privy Council which represents the interests of the magnates and the nobility, has become weak and ineffectual. Plagued by corruption and stubborn conservatism, the council is impeding the progress of our empire, and it is time that it be abolished. Let all political authority retun to the sovereign, where it rightfully belongs.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cost of future [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies is reduced by 10%
Christian IV of Denmark-Norway has abolished the Rigsraad.
Lost Nordic Settlement

A band of explorers have approached us for patronage to seek out a lost nordic settlement, founded in ancient times by our ancestors. In exchange for gold to cover expenses, and a bit of the glory, if successful, this settlement will be claimed in the name of the empire.[NEWLINE]
Fund this expedition immediately!
That seems a waste of state funds.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Settler, two free Scouts, and a free Kontreadmiral[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have become patron to an expedition to seek out a lost nordic settlement.
We have refused to patronise an expedition to seek out a lost nordic settlement.
Pietist Movement

Certain members of our faith, led by the theologian Philipp Spener, contend that our religious elite are corrupted by greed and impiety. A movement calling for the revival of a more devout, traditional style of {1_ReligionName} has begun, and they appeal to us to embrace their ideals.[NEWLINE]
Yes. Let us adopt a more pietist faith.
Bah. This is sacriligious nonsense.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} {2_Yield}[ENDCOLOR]
We have embraced the ideals of Pietism.
We have rejected the ideals of Pietism.
Christian VI DENMARK_NORWAY-Norway has embraced the ideals of the Pietist Movement.
Christian VI DENMARK_NORWAY-Norway has rejected the ideals of the Pietist Movement.
Norwegian Tensions

Our Norwegian subjects have become discontent with our rule being centred on Copenhagen. Some of the more radical elite are beginning to discuss the creation of an independent Norway, whilst others merely wish for a greater devolution of powers to Christiania. Something must be done to settle these tensions before they become a threat to the Dano-Norwegian union.
Let us re-locate our capital to Christiania.
Very well. Let us grant greater autonomy unto Norway.
We shall tour Norway. A visit from their sovereign shall distract them.
We shall not act to appease these ingrates.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Copenhagen enters 5 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Christiania becomes your new [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Christiania begins celebrating 20 turns of 'We Love the King Day'[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Copenhagen enters 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Christiania begins celebrating 10 turns of 'We Love the King Day'[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]30% chance of rebels spawning near to Christiania[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and Christiania begin celebrating 5 turns of 'We Love the King Day'[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance of rebels spawning near to Christiania[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital begins celebrating 10 turns of 'We Love the King Day'[ENDCOLOR]
We have conceded to the upset of our Norwegian realm by re-locating our capital to Christiania. This has upset many of our Danish officials in Copenhagen, however.
We have conceded to the upset of our Norwegian realm by conferring upon them greater autonomy. This has upset some of our Danish officials in Copenhagen, however.
We have embarked upon a ten-day tour of our Norwegian realm. This seems to have put to rest any talk of independence, and has impressed our Danish officials in Copenhagen.

We have embarked upon a ten-day tour of our Norwegian realm. Though this has impressed our Danish officials in Copenhagen, it has not satisfied all, and secessionist rebels have risen up against us in Norway.
We have decided against acting upon the discontentment in our Norwegian realm. This seems to have come to no fault, and our show of conservatism has impressed our Danish officials.

We have decided against acting upon the discontentment in our Norwegian realm. Though our show of conservatism has impressed our Danish officials, this has not satisfied all, and secessionist rebels have risen up against us in Norway.
Tensions are brewing between Denmark and Norway in the {1_CivName}.
